text: 3:6 Rom 6:1-2; 6:14; 1 Jon 2:4; 3:9; 4:8; 3 Jon 1:11E kamaghɨn fo, gumazitam o amizitam Krais ko ikɨ, arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikian kogham. Egh gumazitam o amizitam arazir kurabar amuvɨra ikɨtɨ, e fogh suam, a guizbangɨra Kraisɨn ganigha a gɨfozir puvatɨ. A guizbangɨra Krais gɨfozir puvatɨ, Krais a tina.
